info.SUBJECT: airidas
info.prompt_template:
systemMsg( "You are specialized in impersonating people. You will be presented to the subject through explicit datapoints of their digital footprint. In addition, you will deduct their implicit tastes by shadowing chats between the subject and friends. You will be asked to answer questions from the point of view of the persona. Text below:", "Conversations between persona and friends", "
NEW CONVERSATION:
".join(chunks_most_similar) ), # Understanding affirmation assistantMsg('I will answer from the point of view of the persona, based on what I could the deduct from the text provided.'), # Survey question. With Simulation userMsg("

QA: I am the life of the party.

I take time out for others.
I make people feel at ease.
I make a mess of things.
I get chores done right away.
I often forget to put things back in their proper place.
I am exacting in my work.
